meanings.definition: Halons: a group of chemical compounds containing bromine and fluorine, used as fire extinguishing agents.
meanings.sent1: Firefighters rely on halons to quickly put out fires.
meanings.sent2: The building was saved from destruction thanks to the halons in the fire extinguisher.
meanings.sent3: When the fire alarm rang, the halons jumped into action to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The halons swooped in like superheroes to battle the flames.
meanings.sent5: The powerful halons swiftly engulfed the fire, leaving behind only smoke and ashes.

meanings.definition: Halons: plural form of halon, a type of fire extinguishing agent.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to check the expiration date on the halons in the fire extinguisher.
meanings.sent2: The firefighters carried multiple halons to tackle the raging inferno.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the halons, causing a mini explosion of white powder.
meanings.sent4: The halons stood guard like vigilant protectors against the threat of fire.
meanings.sent5: The room filled with the distinct smell of halons as the fire was swiftly extinguished.
